Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Deconstruction of the DECLARE Model: 1. Unary Constraints: existence ReceiveApplication GatherAdditionalDocuments absence ProceedWithoutCompliance exactlyone PreliminaryCreditCheck init ReceiveApplication 2. Binary Constraints response ReceiveApplication to PreliminaryCreditCheck precedence QualityAssuranceReview to AuthorizeContractTerms succession PreliminaryCreditCheck to GatherAdditionalDocuments

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: response A B: If A happens B must happen afterwards. precedence E F: E must happen before F or standard Target before Source. succession B C: B followed by C tightly coupled

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Hypothesis dictionary key is Activation target is Target standard DECLARE response A B means A then B precedence A B means B then A. Alternative natural language precedence Source before Target

Name: Validation - NE
Text: Test against real life: precedence E F if standard F then E Authorize before QA contradicts business logic chainsuccession E D QA before Assemble plausible but chainprecedence F B Authorize before Credit Check wrong

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: CRITICAL RE-EVALUATION OF SEMANTICS pivot to standard vs natural test altprecedence H G standard G then H Transfer before Notify correct refine noncoexistence G A as strict sequencing not mutual exclusion

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Infer best explanation constraints shape controlled flow noncoexistence prevents disbursement before application by enforcing dependency despite strict semantics interpret as no parallelism

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Business Logic First Lens interpret precedence E F as QA before Authorize focus on intended protective effect phases Intake Verification Quality Gate Execution Closure

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: From constraints generalize to loan lifecycle A init B exactly once C existence linked F D to E G chain to D H after G absence Z forbids non-compliance ensures sequence compliance quality
